title: Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall
summary: Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, GCVO, CSM, PC (born Camilla Rosemary Shand, later Parker Bowles; 17 July 1947), is a member of the British royal family as the wife of Charles, Prince of Wales, heir apparent to the British throne. Despite being entitled to be known as the Princess of Wales, she uses the title Duchess of Cornwall.
